headline: Everest Announces Ricardo Anzaldua Plans to Retire as General Counsel
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, September 24, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, today reported that Ricardo Anzaldua, EVP and General Counsel has announced his intention to retire in the coming months. The Company has commenced a search to identify a successor. In the interim, Mr. Anzaldua will continue to serve as General Counsel to assist in a seamless transition.

The Company has commenced a search to identify a successor. In the interim, Mr. Anzaldua will continue to serve as General Counsel to assist in a seamless transition.

headline: TELUS Digital Named a Leader in Everest Group Customer Experience Management (CXM) PEAK Matrix® Assessment - Americas for the Seventh Consecutive Year
summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, September 24, 2025--TELUS Digital named Leader in Everest Group’s CXM PEAK Matrix® – Americas, recognized for CX transformation, Fuel iX™, agentic AI, and automation.

headline: Everest Reinsurance opens office in Gujarat, India
summary: The GIFT City location is intended to broaden the company’s regional footprint and enhance engagement with local clients.
